name: The Tress Press Digital Styling Iron
categories: Hair, Tools, Hair Straighteners & Flat Irons
about: What it is:.A styling iron to straighten, wave, or curl all hair types while smoothing and adding shine...Key benefits:.- Straightens and curls.- Smooths.- Adds shine..If you want to know more….The Tress Press features ionic technology and titanium plates for smooth, shiny, quick curls/waves or straight styles. Floating plates provide constant contact with the hair to straighten in one pass, while the rounded edges allow you to wrap hair around the barrel for curls and waves. It features digital temperature control, 60-minute automatic shut-off, and a professional length nine-foot cord...What else you need to know:.This product is guaranteed with a two-year limited warranty.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Work in one- to two-inch (two to five cm) cleanly parted, brushed sections..-To straighten: hold iron horizontally. Clamp hair at the root and slowly pull through to the ends, slightly beveling toward the face to prevent static..-To curl: hold iron vertically. Clamp hair midway through the section, then twist the iron away from your face 180 degrees and pull forward through to the ends..-The slower you pull, the greater the curl. For waves, pull through more quickly.

reviews.review_text: Drybar flat iron stopped working after 3 months. No warranty support.

reviews.review_title: Not feeling myself for time without my straightene
reviews.review_text: I swore by babybliss hair straighteners my whole life. I have thick and crazy hair and anything other than one, even a chi has always taken so long to straighten that I had given up on the whole idea when my babybliss straightener got lost in a move. I've tried so many others and literally want to cry. I hear amazing things about this straightener although to be honest I haven't personally tried it. I'm begging sephora to please gift me one, a straightener of any kind that's similar in quality to the babybliss. I'll write u reviews forever on any and everything for the chance to be gifted  one.  My life has seriously been depressing and my style and self esteem has become non-existence without my straight hair to make me feel beautiful.  I'm begging u to plz plz help me feel like me again with this one item. I can't afford 300 bucks to spend on one to have it not work how I want It or need it to.  Send me the bill I'll pay it if it delivers results.  Thanks so much for reading this xoxo

reviews.review_title: My go to for straight hair!

reviews.review_title: Best on market for sensitive hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not the sleekest-looking or highest quality straightener on the market; HOWEVER, if you have fine, thin, or damaged hair this is likely the best option for you bc you can control the temp in increments of 10 degrees. There is NO reason to straighten your hair at 365 or 425 -- which are the common heat options for single or dual temp straighteners -- if your hair will straighten at lower temps. High heat is horribly damaging to your hair if you don't have thick coarse strands. I set the Tress Press at 220 and it works perfectly for me and doesn't fry my hair. Love this tool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this straightener. It gets my hair very straight and doesn’t tug at my strands and cause breakage like other straighteners I have tried. It glides very easily and is lightweight as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worked great until it just magically stopped working out of nowhere. Very disappointed for the poor quality given the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, curly hair and this straightener puts it in its place! It doesn’t make my ends look fried, and leaves my hair looking and feeling smooth! My only issue (and why it didn’t get five stars) is after about 10 months the yellow paint started coming off near the plates! I wouldn’t mind the paint chipping if it wasn’t flaking off into my hair while using it, but since it does I just have to check and make sure I don’t have any paint chips in my hair after using. Overall, a really good straightener that I would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I really loved the yellow color but after a few uses I did notice it get a bit darker near the plates which sucks. Also I feel like this hair straightener does less damage to my hair then my Chi one did. I like that it has different heat options that go up to 450, I like to use mine at 400.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this straightener, it heats up so fast doesn’t burn my hair, and I find that it leaves my hair silky after using it not dry and brittle like other straighteners I’ve used. Also perfect for curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this iron! I have thick, curly hair and it straightens my hair perfectly. I also love being able to know exactly when it is up to the desired temperature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing at first, Then it randomly stopped working. For  it to break within 5 months of having it is very disappointing and annoying. Apparently you do have a 24 month or so warranty so hopefully I can get a new one. If not it’s not worth almost $200 for it to not even last me a year or two ! I did love this straightener while it lasted though.
Had this in my cart for the sale and noticed it magically jumped up $25, will not be proceeding

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product, it’s my second one! The first one I got it 2 years ago and I left it in a hotel and of course it wasn’t there when I came back, So I got a new one because I can’t live without it! It’s amazing!! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This flatiron is 100% worth the money!! My last one lasted me 5 years and I used A LOT (like more than once a week) I like that you can change the temperature as some people don’t like to have as much heat on their hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The smoke seemed to be coming from behind the plate of the straightener. Very scary, it is a fire hazard. I feel that if I didn’t unplug it, there was a high possibility it would have started a fire, this is my worst fear. Not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

I like the drybar dry shampoo, so I thought the straightener would be great.  It is not.  It takes forever to straighten each section and is even hotter than what temp I used with the Amika. reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: DOES NOT LAST...Back to Chi I go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this straightener 14 months ago in a set with the Buttercup hair dryer and a few hair products. But yesterday, the bottom plate did not heat up at all. I loved that I could curl or straighten with one tool. But for $150 I would expect more. I've had Chi Flat irons that lasted for 10 years and you can get them for $50 at Marshall's. I expected this to last much longer than 14 months because of the brand. But I guess I've learned my lesson. Back to Chi flat irons I go. I just hope my Buttercup hair dryer doesn't die too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this straightener!  This is my second purchase of this product.  It glides easily and leaves my hair smooth and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the straightener until it died on me after about 14 months of usage. I wish I would have purchased from Sephora but I purchased directly from dry bar-who has the worst customer service ever.   I really like their products until they stop working and nobody will help you. It has a 24 month warranty- yet to get the new straightener sent to me it will be 4-6 weeks. Also I’m required to pay for all shipping. Makes no sense to me- it is not my fault the straightener stopped working. I would go with a Chi straightener- just as good quality, cheaper, and last 5x as long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

I highly recommend it, my hair is super straight (it’s naturally curly/wavy), feels so soft (I use the Hot Toddy Spray & Verb products) & looks super healthy!! I’m so so pleased with it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Love the smooth external matte feel, colour and heat speed. I have super curly hair and can't usually straighten over it nicely without brushing or using a comb, but I can do it with the tress press. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: worst hair straightener I've ver had

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was honestly not expecting to be as blown away as I am by this flat iron! I have wavy/curly hair that tends to get verrrry frizzy when I get anywhere near any sort of humidity. The first time I used it, it did have a weird fresh out of the factory plasticky smell when it first heated up, but by the second time I used it, I didn’t smell that again. It is quite pricey so I’m hoping it lasts me a long time, but to me, the effect it had on my hair was well worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This flat iron is amazing! It makes your hair incredibly smooth and soft! If you straighten your hair often I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used this once but it’s the best straightener I’ve ever used. My hair was soft, shiny and frizz free! Even though it’s damaged you could tell at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, frizzy, and wavy hair and was in need of a new straightener. This iron smoothed my hair really nice BUT it for sure takes several run throughs to get out my waves. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just got mine in the mail this morning and the first thing I did when I got home was to try it out, I was so excited when I got home that I didn’t even wash my hair before trying. Even with my oily and fine hair it gave my hair the best texture. I pondered if it was going to be a great purchase because of the price, but if you are in doubt just give it a try, my guess is that you will not return it!
I really liked this straightener--but it stopped working less than a year after purchase! One of the plates stopped heating.

reviews.review_title: just okay but is peeling after a year.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this flat iron about a year ago. I love the ease of use and how quickly it heats up. I don't use it often as I prefer to use a steampod. Even with little use the yellow has begun peeling off. At this price point I don't feel this should be happening. I paid much less for my Hai convertible flat iron years ago and used it daily without these types of issues. I wouldn't recommend this product. It's no better than other flat irons and the peeling is annoying.

reviews.review_title: Best flat iron I’ve ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using a ceramic flat iron that I’ve had for probably over 10 years and was pretty happy with. Or so I thought. My daughter recently had a blowout at a Drybar salon and her hair looked spectacular! I headed to Sephora to check out the Drybar potions, so to speak, to see which one could help me hold a curl since I could never get or hold  the kind of curls my daughter got for minutes, let alone days, as she had after her blowout. Gina at the Mall of Ga store saw me looking bewildered in front of the Drybar section and came to my rescue. “It’s the tools,” she said. I have to admit I was a bit skeptical and was really not prepared to shell out this much cash for a flat iron when I had a perfectly good one at home. She grabbed a couple of bottles and this iron and led me to the makeover area, sprayed some Hot Toddy over a section of my hair, ironed it, and said “feel your hair.” I could not believe my eyes nor my fingers! My hair was so smooth, shiny, bouncy, soft, and I could feel no product whatsoever in my hair. I was floored! She continued working on my hair and told me that Drybar has videos on you tube for how to make curls using the iron, which is what I had been looking for. A few sprays and strokes of the iron and my hair looked better than I’ve ever seen it! Full, soft, shiny. Who is this anyway staring back at me in the mirror? I headed back to the Drybar display, snatched up an iron and a couple of products at Gina’s recommendation. The next morning, I washed and styled my hair with my new flat iron, curling it at the ends and spritzing with The moneymaker hairspray. Got complements on my hair all day long, even got asked BY A HAIRSTYLIST who does my hair!!! I should mention that I have never been particularly good at styling hair, so this says a lot. I feel like this has opened up a whole new world for me, as I can now have the styles that I’ve admired on other people for so long! Yes, it really is that good. So worth it! Thanks Drybar and Gina!

Love the straightener, except after about two years, it has decided to keep shutting off when I use it.  Not sure what's causing it, but I will most likely have to replace it soon.  It's too expensive to break after that amount of time.

reviews.review_title: Functions beautifully and I dig the yellow.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to replace my old Soli flatiron which I loved and had for 5 years. I still think that one was better but this gets it done and I don’t have to do 18,000 passes. Solid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For some reason this does not work for my hair!!! I will literally spend an hour attempting to straighten my hair- I will separate, I will do small sections. It will not get my hair straight. My hair itself is thick, I’m not sure if this is why?  But everyone else (my friends) when they use it, they love it! Works wonderfully with them.  Honestly just giving it away... disappointment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It straight my hair in first apply.. i just love it .. it helps in frizz as well . I just love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. It’s adorable, sleek, doesn’t snag, and warms up instantly. The cord is nice and long as well. I have no regrets

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this iron. Heats up quickly, digital temperature adjustment and doesn’t snag my hair. Only four stars because I hate the cord; too long and heavy. The cord outweighs the iron itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best flat iron I’ve purchased thus far. Straightens my hair in a matter of minutes and leaves it so shiny!!! Will be purchasing the rest of the drybar hair tools.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This straightener keeps my hair straight even the next day. It also takes me minimal time to straighten my hair compared to my old straightener. Its definitely worth the money. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It straightens hair very quickly and you don’t have to set it to a very high heat to get the look you want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It heats up quickly and has even consistent heat. It doesn’t catch your hair in it
Highly recommend! I have really stubborn hair, takes forever to straighten and doesn’t curl at all. But this straightener is literally the best thing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was just okay so I returned it and bought the Bio Ionic, which I love. The plates are very short and the iron itself is heavy. I have a lot of long thick hair so those two things made it undesirable to me. Plus, I just am not a fan of titanium since you can damage your hair really quickly if you don’t watch it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been straightening my hair since middle school (for over 15 years) so I’ve seen the good, the bad, and the ugly of hair straighteners. This one is one of the best! I recommend it for anyone with long, thick, wavy hair! My hair is so straight, soft, and doesn’t do damage. It has different temps for all different hair types. I love it! Plus, it’s so pretty!

I've been using flat irons for 15 years. I have very thin, fine hair. It's short and stacked so I need to straighten it to style it daily. Every single straightener I've ever had ends up pulling my hair. Not this one. I LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the same model as 3 years ago, sometimes change isn’t good! :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It turns off on me about three times every layer. I can barely do a few passes through my hair before it turns off and I have to wait for it to heat up again. It should take me about 20 minutes max to straighten my hair and with this product always shutting off it doubles my time. It honestly gets so bad that I go back to my broken hair straightener to finish the rest of my head. I paid $150 for what I thought was a nice hair straightener, but this thing is garbage... If I could still return it and get my money back I would

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This straightener is seriously the best. It heats up within seconds and leaves my hair looking healthy. I used cheaper brands for years and my hair ended up fried - not with Drybar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: it heats up in a matter of seconds. Cons: I have fine, unruly hair and I don't find it keeps my hair straight all day or for 24 hours the way other flat irons have in the past. I have had it for about 3 years now and am thinking of replacing it with a GHD. I think this would work well for someone with naturally very straight hair but I wouldn't recommend it for anyone with curl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the straightener you need. It’s worth the money. As someone who straightens their hair everyday, the Tress Press is quick (straight the first round) and it leaves your hair feeling silky, rather than dry like hay which many other leading straighteners do. I don’t feel guilty straightening my hair anymore because the Tress Press gives me healthy looking and feeling hair. No frizz and no worries of burning your hair off. I recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This straightener is pretty bomb but I really just couldn't justify the cost relative to others. It was not terribly different from a CHI or other less expensive brand. If you are looking for a splurge it is very nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This straightener is AMAZING. It heats up so quickly and is very efficient on my thick hair. Yes, it's priced high because it's DryBar, but it really is fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best flat iron out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give negative stars I would. This tool is horrible all around, and I’m in shock they charge $150 for it. The only thing good about it is the yellow is very pretty. However I used this twice and the paint around the plates already started chipping, a lot! When the devise heats up I noticed the place where the plates are turns a different color yellow, almost a burnt yellow. But once it cools off it goes back to normal. However this was after only two uses, so I’m wondering how long it would take for the color to change permanently. Also it pulled and tugged on my hair, definitely uncomfortable and not a single pass! This also feels cheaply made and not a long term device. Listen to the negative reviews, and buyer beware!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this in the mail today and was excited to use it.  It didn't work for me however. It snagged my hair and it didn't move smoothly over my hair. For the price I had high hopes :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this straightener for 2 weeks and I’ve been using it almost daily. I love how fast i can straighten my hair and it leaves it pin straight and shiny. I previously had a CHI and that one stopped working on me, although I did have it for 5 years. The CHI however never gave me the pin straight hair I desired even when new. I am not rating it 5 stars for the fact that I noticed that occasionally it does tug my hair, I don’t section my hair in small pieces but I didn’t do that which the CHI either and that one didn’t pull my hair. Other than the occasional hair pulling (not painful but annoying) I’ve been really like it for the end results and it lasts, I sleep with my hair in a ponytail and it’ll still remain straight the next day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my third purchase. I feel like the average life of these is about 2-3 years depending the care. It still works great and doesn't leave my hair smelling burnt. It still passes smoothly through my hair. I section my hair into smaller pieces so the size isn't an issue. But if you don't do that, then maybe this flat iron isn't for you. The update they made was a on/off button (finally!) and warming up takes about 1 minute or 2. So you can literally turn it on, set the temp, section your hair and it's ready for use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. BUT I strongly recommend that you watch the heat level. if you have normal fine hair 320 is plenty of heat! I was using it at 450 (max) on my hair and my extensions and I fried my ends and now my clip ins stink... lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This straightener is awesome.  Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best flat iron I’ve ever purchased by a long shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After the first use of it, the yellow plastic around the heating plate would chip off and burn causing an awful smell. I had to return this product, purchased a GHD Platinum  , hope that does a better job!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I left a review a week ago which was never posted. Here's another attempt, don't purchase this it's horrible. I based my purchase off reviews and I was sadly disappointed. The yellow paint chipped off due to the heat after the FIRST use. Imagine freshly washed and blow dried hair getting dirty from your flat iron!!! I have incredibly curly hair 3B-3C type to be exact. This did NOTHING for my hair. I did the same routine I've done with previous flat irons and this one left my hair dry and dull. Don't waste your money curly haired girls. This was a disappointing waste of money. So let down by Drybar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There are no words to describe how amazing this straightener is and how fast the magic works! I have thick, curly hair and it has taken up to 1+ hr to straighten my hair; the time typically includes multiple retouches. This straightener took 15 minutes. I kid you not. 15 MINUTES! I didn’t know what to do with almost 45 minutes cut off. (Drank a cup of coffee, which as a mom, you know how amazing a surprise break can be!). If you are thinking about getting one or reading reviews, you need to stop. Put your phone down. Run straight to your nearest Sephora and purchase ... NOW!

reviews.review_title: First flat iron and loving it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yup love it. I bought it in need of a flat iron while I was in Montreal to do my hair for a night out. I love how fast it can hear up and it's super easy to make curls with on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly one of the best I have owned. I usually buy higher end straighteners, so far I have no complaints. I’ve even had my sister use it and she said she’s definitely interested in purchasing one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been straightening my hair for 15  years and this is worse than a lot of straighteners I've tried from the drugstore. I returned it after testing it for a good two weeks. The biggest no for me was the fact that this is very uncomfortable to use. I honestly think it was starting to give me carpal tunnel symptoms. The barrel is very chunky and slippery and hard to comfortably press the plates together. It also doesn't give me the straight look I'm going for. Since it's curved around the plates and the plates are so small, it would always curl my hair under, not straight. The plates are also very short lengthwise, so you literally have to work with tiny 1 sections each time. For someone with thick hair, that can take forever! It also did not keep my hair straight - my hair would start to curl within an hour or two. For the price and brand, I expected a lot better. The only nice thing about this iron is the vibrant yellow colour. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best straightener Ive ever used! Heats up so quickly, and works so well! Other irons have pulled my hair while using it and this one never does. I bought the blow dryer too and its amazing also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love!! This is a great flat iron. Heats up quickly, straightens

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The second time i used this, the yellow paint is starting to chip! The color is really pretty that is one of the reasons i got this. But it’s not worth it. Will be returning. Also it’s smooth on my hair but when i use it for curls it doesn’t make it smooth:/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was attracted to the Color and price of this product but I’ll be returning it. It made my hair look very frizzy and it did not hold well to the humidity. Also my hair isn’t super smooth after using it, I had to pass it a couple of times on each hair strand but it still wasn’t the sleek smooth look I was going for. Also, my biggest issue with this is that it kept pulling my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good straightener. I haven't had it that long, but the yellow coating has been peeling off. It doesn't look good and it's hard to clean because of the peeling. For this reason, I wouldn't recommend this iron.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only had it for a month or so, but so far love it. I have had a chi, croc, ghd, sedu, rowenta and this is prob the best. It gets really hot which I love. Yes, the pretty yellow flakes right off. Also, the titanium doesn’t glide as smoothly as ceramic, but I do think it straightens better. As long as it keeps working this well I’ll be very happy. One negative is having to push the button so many times to get to high. It should remember.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is the best styling iron I've used. And heats up almost instantly. I wish its metal piece was a bit longer though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this picture since the reviews were great. After the first use I instantly realized it did the same as my 20 dollar one. I returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed... yellow paint from hair iron flaking off into my hair. I’ve barely used this flat iron

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loved the iron although in the manual says that less degrees I use it hotter and it serves me better and that I have never painted my hair or I have mistreated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Returning this product. After two uses, the yellow was coming off in my hair. I’ve used this iron 3 times and it looks like I’ve had it for years! It is not worth the price at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to use primarily for curling but also to straighten my hair occasionally. I am new to the hair game and it took me about 40 minutes to get the technique down but once I did, it was pretty simple. The tress press heats up SO FAST and it doesn’t leave me a frizzy mess afterwards. Worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this flat iron for a year now and it has really started to go down hill. After having only CHI flat irons I decided to try a new brand, this one is what I chose. It was really good in the beginning. It heated up fast and didn’t damage my hair. But now after a year of use It turns itself off when I’m using it and seems to not be as hot as it was in the beginning. For the price this one should last longer than a year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I absolutely love this iron. It is very light, and just glides over my hair leaving it super shiny! It heats up incredibly fast as well. I absolutely recommend this straightener!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best flat iron I have ver owned!!! I have very long thick hair and it works like magic, literally one pass and it is straight or curled/waived! Highly recommend! Super funky looking, like a piece of sunshine in your bathroom! Love from the first sight!

reviews.review_title: My Straighter and Curling Iron in One!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in the market for a new flat iron and did a lot of research. I've never been able to get my fine straight hair to hold a curl. My hair stylist suggest I get a flat iron that was recommended for curling because people that have trouble with getting their hair to curl often has success when they get the curl from a flat iron. I landed on the Tress Press off recommendation and WOW.   I curled my hair with it the day I got it, I thought it would take me a while to get the hang of it but I was able to do it with ease right away. I put NO product in my hair and the curls stayed the whole day. This was so worth the money considering it has now before my straightener AND my curling iron. Thank you Drybar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I wasn’t all too impressed with this flat iron. The plates are a lot smaller than a standard straightener or at least the ones I’ve had before. My hair also felt more full after I straighten it. I have full curly hair so when I straighten my hair, I want it to be as flat as possible.  The only difference between this and a regular $30 flat iron is that my hair felt a little more softer. If you have the money, I say try it out. Otherwise, don’t waste your money when there’s a lot more affordable ones on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair looks shiny, healthy and straight ☺️ Easy to use and really pretty! I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This straightener is alright if you don’t use it often. I have extremely curly hair and use it on a daily basis. This straightener is alright but I felt that I had to pass it over multiple times in order to get it straight. I was willing to keep this since it looks cute and does the job until the yellow paint started to chip off only 2 WEEKS after I had purchase it... going to return it ASAP

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this straightener. Makes my hair feel so soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best hair straightener I’ve ever used! Heats up in 10 seconds and you can save your preferred heat and in a click of a button it’ll heat up to that temperature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use, works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this straightener. It was my first “expensive” straightener so I don’t have anything to compare it to but it is very nice!

reviews.review_title: I have a love-hate relationship with this thing.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use it daily to straighten my hair and it gets the job done, however it doesn’t glide over my hair like my old Sedu one did (minus one star) and the cord drives me crazy- It gets so twisted (minus another star). I do like how I can curl/wave my hair with it. I also love how it matches the curling iron, blow dryer, and brush perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this iron for about a week now and it is fantastic.  It is perfect for creating both pin-straight and wavy styles and does not overheat and ruin my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This styling iron is the best one I have ever owned. It is not heavy to hold and work with and my hair does not look dry and frizzy after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after my tried-and-true Solia straightener died after 7 years of use.  I really like this one because it heats up in a matter of seconds and has a digital temperature monitor.  Usually it just takes a few passes through my hair (fine and thick) to get the frizz out.  I'm happy with this purchase.  Seems to make my hair really shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Better than a chi, heats up SUPER fast. Never snags my hair and I never need more than one pass. The buttons don't get in the way and has a clear temp readout on the outside. Expensive, but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Only used once so far but... love it!

reviews.review_title: BUY THIS YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical buying this because of the price, and I was thinking how could this be any better at making my hair smooth and shiny than any other straighteners? I DON'T KNOW HOW but this literally made my hair sooo silky and shiny! It also cut down the time it takes to straighten my hair by like 2/3! Im so glad I spent the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MY NEW FAV♥️  My hair is so thick , it’s so hard to curl and I got the job done in 20 minutes!!

reviews.review_title: Don’t buy this! Cheap and broke after 15 months.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought my Tress Press in October 2016. It worked fine (not terrible, not amazing) but the product itself is not high quality. The yellow casing cracked and chipped almost immediately but the real problem is that after only 15 months, the straightener has started to turn itself off every 30-60 seconds. Unless you want to straighten your hair in 30 second sprints then I recommend choosing a different product.   A lot of the reviews seem to be from people who just recently purchased the Tress Press. Take it from someone who owned and used the straightener for over a year and don’t be fooled by the high ratings and Drybar brand name.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has been straightening their hair for 10 years now, this is one of the best flat irons I have ever used. I love that it allows me to choose my heat settings as I need my irons to get hot. It heats up in a matter of seconds, glides smoothly through my thick hair with no pulling or tugging, and I can actually see a difference after a single pass through my hair! I've tried out the T3 and GHD irons, and this one blows them away. If you are in the market for a new flat iron, the Tress Press is hands down the one to get!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gets hot really quickly, and works on my hair great. My biggest disappointment is that I haven’t had it that long and all the lovely yellow has scraped off from just regular use. It looks lien is 5 years old. If I’m spending this much for a styling tool I want it to be able to hold up to regular and daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NATURALISTAS! I have black natural 4B/4C hair and my Chi flat iron was just not getting it done and I gave up on straightening my hair outside the salon. I actually discovered this when DryBar was at Sephora doing free hairstyles and the stylist assured that she could easily heat style my braided, not straightened, natural hair. Boy did this deliver. She did one swipe. One swipe. ONE. SWIPE per piece of hair, and my entire head of hair was straight in about 15 minutes. No additional product other than the hair primer and coconut oil I had put in earlier that day. Turns out titanium > ceramic. Bought it in-store immediately after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally obsessed with this product never been to a dry bar salon, but decided to get this on a whim. Best decision I’ve ever made works just as well as my GHD one that finally gave out. My hair is very thick, frizzy, and curly -literally no one knows after I straighten my hair with this straighter that it isn’t natural. Feels soft and smooth using this along with my Briogeo products does wonders for my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i had read all the reviews, and i took a chance to see how it would work in my long (mid-back) thick wavy hair! when i got it i had to try it right away: couldn't believe how fast it was heated up (seconds) only had to pass it once,also loved that it left my hair nice and shiny  !! i totally recommend this worth every penny :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this styling iron for Christmas and I absolutely love it! It straightens my hair faster then my old iron and leaves my hair nice and smooth with a polished finish. The color is cute too! It is well worth the price! I definitely recommend it. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was such an upgrade from my old flat iron which I bought at Sephora a few years ago. I love it. It works great and I feel like it doesn't dry out my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have both the Drybar straightener and blow dryer. I love the auto shut off. It seems so much easier to use this iron compared to Chi

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been to a drybar but boy or boy I am obsessed with this! I have the three day bender curling iron , and buttercup blow dryer thanks to my husband.. Drybar products are incredible. This  straightened my long curly hair so fast and its so silky and smooth. I dont know how I lived without this. I have always used bigger 1.5 in flat irons untill now. It curls with this too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When you first straighten your hair with this, it makes it look SUPER straight and shiny. However, it does not keep it that way for long at all. I straightened my hair at night so in the morning I could just do some touch ups. Woke up 6 hours later and my hair had some wave/poof to it like I didn't straighten it all. This has never happened to me w a straightener before, my hair will stay pretty much straight until I wash it. I will be returning. Not worth the price at all.   I have thick hair btw, but it's not unmanageable.

reviews.review_title: gentle on hair, yet gets the job done!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really good product! straightens in one go! and easy to make wavy curls too.  the temperature control is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Heats up fast. My stubbornly straight hair actually holds a curl with this iron!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Guys wow. This saved my life. I have very thick and course asian hair. Air drying makes it super frizzy and I have to blow dry. I washed my hair today and was too lazy to sit down and blow dry it so I decided to air dry it. Then my door bell rang and my order arrived! Busted this baby out to take it for a test run right away. Took me 15 minutes to straighten my hair (heat to 410F as suggested by the manual) and I got the same results as if I were to blow-dry. Now I have two options: blow-dry (takes 20-30 minutes) or let air dry on lazy days and straighten my hair for the same effect in 10-15 minutes!  I have yet to try to do curls/waves with this but I'm sure it'l turn out pretty good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally! Finally! Oh yeah, and finally!    I always had trouble getting my hair to last the day, even with straightening product but, within a couple hours, it would start to curl back up. Had a stylist in New York do my entire head and I was hooked. So impressed that I even bought the traveler.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to use and great results! It feels like I put my hair through a conditioning treatment and I've never been able to straighten my thick hair so fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Couldn't believe the price, but this straightener does it all. As I was mourning the death of my Paul Mitchell Ion straightener of nine years, this baby stepped into my life. It heats up in a minute with a digital display, it has auto turn off (should see the burn marks on my counters) and styles fantastically. It doesn't grab hair, requires only one pass and curls just as fantastic as my last. I would buy this again and again! Amazing item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Recommended by the girls at Sephora.  I was looking to purchase one of the more expensive models but I am so happy I listened to them!  I have fine thin hair and the straightener is great for making the hair more sleek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. Love it ! Worth every penny! It heats up pretty quick and it takes less than 5mins to do my hair :)) absolutely adore it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My old straightener died after 15 years and I was nervous about buying a new one that would compare to it. I bought this one and am extremely happy with my choice. I can straighten my hair in about 10 minutes with this thing, and curling is also a breeze. Considering buying the mini for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very impressed with this product. Very smooth on the hair and design is user-friendly, easy to hold and use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite straightener of all time. Really kind to my hair, I haven't had any bad hair days using it. Lets my hair keep its natural bounce and hydration without making it look like hay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I expected great things from this appliance and it did render good things, I think my hair is just too damaged. I also noticed it chipped from one of the ends and I have no idea how! So I’m a little mad I spent 150 on something my old flat iron could keep doing BUT main point: it is a really nice product.

I bought this today, super excited and itching to use it. I sectioned off my hair to test straight vs wavy. When i straightened it it seemed okay but took multiple passes to straighten, even at a high heat. I then tried curling my hair, which was AWFUL. I've done with with my old straightener, so I know it wasn't my technique. The plates would catch my hair, making it hard to pull the hair through smoothly. This left several small lines in each section. Even better, most of the time it wouldn't even curl. Just kink and fry my hair. I'm very disappointed and will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best straightener! I have color treated hair and this straightener leaves it so shiny every time! I've used it about 2 times a week for the past 2 months or so and I see no hair damage. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BEST STRAIGHTENER EVER! It heats up crazy fast, the buttons are on the inside so you won't be able to push them accidentally, it glides over the hair so easily. For lasting results, I use a heat protectant, brush each section (keep them reasonable) and then follow with the iron! It does work to curl and wave hair as well, but even with my fine hair, I have to turn up the heat a little more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I walked into the store thinking I was buying a fantastic flat iron but nope. I had it on the highest heat and it took multiple passes on my hair to get it straight. I also hated the non ceramic plates as they didn't glide other my hair smoothly and pulled
I LOVE this flat iron! It heats up quickly and definitely does its job. I'm sold on drybar after this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was nervous to purchase but so glad I did! Definitely worth the money. Heats up to 450 degrees in seconds. Love that you cant smell your hair burning when you use it, like you do with other irons. Fun color, and very easy to keep clean. Really east to maneuver with a nice long cord. great for curling and straightening!

Was on the market for a new straightener and was trying to decide between this and the platinum GHD. This was recommended by a Sephora employee and I am happy I went with this choice. It's more affordable than the GHD and incredibly effective.

I'm so glad I picked this one.  It works much better than the cheap one I had before.  It straightens my stubborn hair without frying it. Plus, I feel safe using it at its lowest temperature on my daughters' super fine hair.

If you are ever going to buckle down and get a straightener that will last you until the end of time, do a darn good job, keep your hair straight even into the next day, and ACTUALLY not fry your hair then I beg you to get this product.

My 2nd chi in a row died so I used this opportunity to try a new flatiron. So far I LOVE! I have curly hair and this truly only takes 1 pass and my hair stays straight.  I also find it easier to wave/do flatiron curls. Nice that u can control the temp. I only gave 4 stars for now bc waiting to make sure no hair damage. So far so good and worth the money!

This iron does what it is supposed to do. It definitely straightens hair quickly, but you do have to go over every section more than once. I noticed when I was using this that some weird smoke was coming out of it. I straightened my hair twice: once with product and once without any product, both times hair was completely dry. The smoke or whatever was coming from the device was going into the back of my throat and made me cough. It was so weird as in all my years of straightening hair I've never experienced anything like this. Not sure what it could have been
Do not like this flat iron at all! I have thick fine curly hair and it doesn't get my hair straight . A $40 flat iron does a better job than this

More than satisfied with this. My hair is thick and wavy, but the straightener leaves it so smooth and straight. Worth the buy! Also, the yellow color is adorable. The straightener itself doesn't feel like it's made of anything special, but it heats up noticeably fast and gets the job done. Would recommend to friends!

reviews.review_title: LOVE IT BUT IT MAKES MY HAIR GREASY
reviews.review_text: I can live with the grease but I love the BLOWDRYER MORE BY farrr with a round brush it's very good though money well spent I just haven't used it in a bit

I've been on the hunt for a new flat iron for a long time, this one seemed to check all the necessary boxes. I've had it a few weeks now and I'm very happy with my purchase. It heats up unbelievably fast, the beveled edges make it easy to curl with and my hair is left shiny and smooth (no easy task with my frizzy thick waves!)
Love this! Don't have to go over sections numerous times! Heats up fast and has good temperature settings. Best straightener I've owned!

I've only had this flat iron for a few weeks and even though I don't have the skill set of a beauty guru, I've already taught myself how to curl my hair with it. For me that's a big plus. I love the bright yellow and overall the fact that I've invested in a good iron is paying off so far!
I LOVE using this as a straightener. It leaves my hair pin straight and shiny, heats up in seconds, and automatically shuts off after an hour in case it's left on. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_title: My skepticism is all gone. Worth the money
reviews.review_text: So I've been playing with flat irons for a while, and although I loved Drybar's hair products, this flat iron is WOOOOOOW. What a difference it makes on my hair! Incredible! I use this every day now. I was really skeptical at first since it's quite expensive and has a brand. But nope­. Totally worth my money. Love it!
Wonderful product. I've used many hair straighteners in my days, but this is by far the best one.

Completely disappointed by this product. I used it once and returned it the next day. It pulled my hair and caused a lot of hair breakage which is not something I look for in a hair styling product. The styling iron felt heavy compared to every other similar product that I have used. In addition, after I straightened my hair, my hair was frizzy and not smooth at all. For a product of this price, the results should be exactly as what the product description promises. Oh, and I agree with a previous product review that I read that stated that it definitely took more than one pass to straighten hair. I should have given more credit to the negative reviews that I read, but because I own the baby buttercup hairdryer and love it, I decided to still go ahead and try this product out. What a mistake.

reviews.review_title: drybar The Tress Press Digital Styling Iron
reviews.review_text: I agree with the majority of the other reviews on this product. It is a great tool in the sense that it looks beautiful, it heats up in ~10 seconds, has a great variance of temperatures and is easy to handle. The only flaw I find with this straightener is that it takes multiple passes to get my hair (slightly thick and wavy) to become pin straight.

I traded in a years old GHD for this baby and I'm not necessarily sorry that I did. The only thing that could be better would be if it did not take more than one run through to get a piece of hair perfectly straight. Almost worth 5 stars.

Bought this to replace an old CHI straightener. Love the color and it does a fantastic job straightening my hair and curling it - can do loose waves and tight curls. Really great tool - I donated my curling iron since this does such a nice job!

It feels so gentle on hair. I've had so many straighteners that make me feel like my hair is just being destroyed, steaming, making noise while pulling down. This so SO SMOOTH, SO SILENT, SO GENTLE, SO FAST. It has an automatic turn off, so you never have to worry about burning your house down or frying your beauty space if you forget to turn it off. Makes my hair glossy and straight as a pin for three days.
Really nice straightener. Plates are smooth enough to easily pull through hair even when curling. Bright yellow color is fun.

I absolutely love this straightener, I actually think its better then the CHI I owned before. I have thicker wavy hair and one pass through with this keeps my hair straight for days on end.  Heats up suuuupper quick and automatically shuts off. Plus the yellow is so fun!

I received this flat iron for Christmas, and frankly the first time I used it, I hated it. I have naturally curly hair that isnt majorly kinky, but still has a lot of volume. People instantly think that because I have curly hair that its thick; however, my hair texture is semi dry and thin.  When I first straightened my baby hairs that surround my face, they didn't straighten nicely and I found it hard to straighten closer to the root with this straightener; however, with time I got the hang of it.  My mother, who's usually straightened my hair pin straight (when I want to go for that look) told me that it looks a lot like my sister's naturally straight hair the second and third time I straightened my hair. As I continued to use it, just at a temp of about 380-410, the results turned out a lot better.  I haven't tried curling with it yet, but I do curl some pieces of hair that don't want to cooperate with me, and for the small sections I've done, it worked pretty well!
This Hair iron is amazing, the titanium plates dont damage your hair and even on a lower heat setting, it still gave me a beautiful style. Can curl and flat iron perfectly. love it!

I have very thick and coarse hair, my hair is also extremely long. I previously had a chi straightener, which it took me about 45 minutes to get my hair straight. After putting lots of product in my hair it was still dry and brittle after using my chi. This straightener is much better, it takes me about 20 Minutes to get through my hair, after I'm done my hair feels healthy and silky. I do notice that it leaves some creases in my hair; but my hair is so thick that they are barely noticeable. I also notice that it kinda hurts my hand to squeeze the straightener together, not sure why. Those are the only two reasons this product didn't get five stars from me.
I have to tell you guys, this iron is awesome and i also got the Drybar The Big Blowout Bundle and i love to have them all. Def. Recommended :D Los amo, mis favorites.

Before I bought this I read into some reviews a watched you tube videos of people saying it only takes one pass to get your hair straight. This not the case with me I need 3 to 4, mind you I have think curly/wavy hair that I blow dry before straightening with the buttercup blow dryer.. This straightener does make my hair very soft I look the texture it leaves. I also love how this glides through my hair easily. This with the buttercup are quite the pair.

I have fine but thick colour treated hair that is naturally wavy and has frizz issues when I air dry it. I also use the buttercup hairdryer and love it. I'm impressed again by the quality of cord and length (i live in an old house so I need all the length of cord I can get to reach an outlet) the unit itself is solid. The plates clean easy with a damp cloth too.  I don't have any problems with my hair sticking on the plates, but I do always keep it at it's lowest temperature setting. I imagine if I had the temperature to high I'd have that problem. I actually managed to get it to curl my hair unlike my past ones! (no kinks or dents)It does a much better job then the torlen ceramic plate straightener my past stylist had recommended and I like it more than my chi  Con: I'm having trouble getting the memory control to set, but I'm thinking this is user error and not the unit. I do wish the plate was a little wider so I could work faster.

I have decided to keep this so it's not too terrible...however, at this price point it definitely does not hit the mark. My previous ceramic straightener was the same price and much better. As others have said, this kind of leaves a mark in your hair as you straighten if you aren't careful. I think it's because the plates are not high quality or ceramic. I would suggest paying less for the same thing or splurging a bit more for higher quality.

I bought this after my Chi Smart finally broke after 6 years. Did not glide over hair, and as soon as I would slightly twist the iron to curve ends of hair out/in, it would get stuck and drag, create dents in the hair and I could actually not pull it through the hair sometimes. Really wanted to love it, but Unfortunately do not recommend and will be returning.

This straightener is great. I have a lot of very wavy hair. It is a pain to straighten a lot of times. This one takes about the same amount of time as some of the other ones I've used (I've used multiple professional ones such as Croc and Paul Mitchell), but it makes my hair feel way better. It feels softer and less fried.  I also love how long the cord is and the auto shut off.

Hands down, this is the best flat iron I've ever used. It straightens in one pass without having to bump up the heat really high (so that saves my damaged hair), the hair glides smoothly between the blades, and it really helps defrizz. I'm really really happy with it. Was totally worth the money.
This straightener is everything that is described and MORE! I love the color, how fast it heats up, how it makes my hair smoother, the long cord and basically everything about it.

I just bought this as a replacement for an older hair straightener and I have to say, I'm pretty impressed. The iron heats up fast, keeps my hair looking healthy and shiny, and doesn't make my hair smell weird like my previous iron did. The only thing that bothers me is the bottom of the iron doesn't have anything to make it not fall over when I rest it on the bathroom counter. Other than that it's perfect. Also curls quite well.

I got this iron after exchanging my GHD Classic iron for it. I'm so glad I did! I have A LOT of very fine hair that I've colour treated, and this is by far the best iron I've found for my hair type! My hair is naturally pretty straight, but this makes in PIN straight easily. The reason I love it the most though, is curling with it is a breeze! No tugging/getting stuck, quick, beautiful lasting curls. The iron's functionality is great, and an added bonus is its adorable! If you have fine-hair, I HIGHLY recommend this especially if you want your iron to curl/wave for you.

I purchased this on a trip when I forgot to pack my GHD flat iron.  It was humid in Houston, and I was desperate.  :)  I actually like this iron much better:  it has a thermostat (the GHD does not), heats up quickly, and grips my hair very firmly (the GHD never gripped well, even when new).  I hope it is as durable as the GHD...I've had mine for 4 years.  I think I'm going to demote my GHD to travel use and use this routinely.

I have been hesitating between this straightener and the ghd ones and finally go with this one. What I like most is that this iron has adjustable temperature while the ghd one fixed the temperature. I receive my iron today and give it a try, it leaves my hair soft and smooth.
This is a great flat iron for thick, curly hair! I've had a hard time finding the right flat iron to manage my hair and this one has done the trick. Spend the money and buy this iron. Now!

This is the BEST straightener I've ever used! I've never bought the more expensive hair styling tools being better but I decided to get this when my last one died since it was on sale. I used it today and it took me 10 minutes to straighten fully curly, thick hair!!! it normally takes me 30-45 minutes to do my hair and it never turns out this well! after I turned it on it heated up in about 45 seconds and stayed hot the whole time. it did seem to pull my hair out a little bit but all straighteners do that a little. my hair is softer, shiny and looks so healthy! BUY THIS!! its definitely worth the price tag!

I have thick coarse curly hair and my hair never stayed straight when I straightened my hair. I have purchased the T3 Single Pass and did nothing for my hair, I went in with the intention to purchase The Tress Press, but the lady said that the T3 was better....she lied. I went to The Domain Sephora and purchased this one instead and I love it!!!!!! My hair is still straight and feels amazing. I'm so thankful that they were such great help. If you're not sure about it... GET IT! Drybar never disappoints.

It is overpriced for what it delivers. Titanium plates are not as smooth and don't glide over hair as well as ceramic. I have had several other professional-irons $140+ & am not that impressed with this one. It does the job. The memory function does not work on my unit. Wouldn't recommend it.
I previously owned a ghd straightener and it did not impress me. This one however is great! I have very thick hair and this works great on me!

I've been using the tress press for about 4 months now and I haven't used another hair tool since. This creates the best straight smooth looks along with the best messy waves. Heats up in seconds and I love the temperature settings since I typically use a lower heat setting than what most use. Was going to get the Dry Bar curling iron but having this, I totally don't need it. Great purchase.

reviews.review_title: Best Hair Tool I've Ever Bought!
reviews.review_text: This tress press can do it all, I have fine medium length hair and have never been able to do curls daily until I found this! Using a straightener as a curling iron keeps my hair curly all day and loosens slightly to a pretty wave! It does take some practice to get the technique right but trust me its worth it, whether I want to be straight or curled, this is the holy grail of hair tools and I've spent money on higher priced tools that didn't do half as good of a job. GET THE TRESS PRESS!!

I have used many different straighteners in the past and have never loved one as much as I love this one. I have thick hair and use my straightener almost every day. I was looking for one that goes to a high heat and this one is perfect as it goes up to 450 F. Makes my hair feel incredibly soft and people have noticeably commented on how straight has been looking. If you're even debating this at all, I recommend trying it! I cant wait to try all the other Drybar products if they're as great as this one!
Worth every penny. I've used several different pricey straighteners in my day but this is the best so far! Highly recommended!

I am in love with this iron! I have long (mid-low back), slightly wavy, thick hair and this is absolutely magical! I generally use it to style my hair with waves, but it works excellent for straightening as well. It smooths out my hair beautifully and it heats up in literally seconds! The yellow is also super cute.

It is not worth the money, time , or energy. I literally straightened my hair and started chatting with my roommate and my hair freezer up... I have had better results with straighteners from the mall kiosks. It's been one day and it will be going back tomorrow1

With all the hype and good reviews on this iron I was expecting it to be a game-changer for me. Each of my hairs is thin, but I have a lot of it and it's difficult to style - it doesn't like to veer from it's natural wavy/curly texture.   While the finished product looks good, I still had to go over sections multiple times even at the highest heat setting. I usually have to do multiple passes over the same section with my cheaper straighteners, so I am disappointed that I have to do the same with The Tress Press. It hasn't saved me really any time in my routine :(

I was leaving Sephora until a Drybar ladies ask me if she wanted to show me how to use the flat iron but to create wave curls , I WAS IN SHOCK!!!! My hair was left just like the saloon, I had to get it, actually I made my hubby get t for my bday :) soooooo happy!!! Guys this is IT, don't waste your time , GET IT, you won't regret it.

Reading reviews I was slightly hesitant of buying the TressPress,but I went for it anyway! I have thick wavy frizzy hair and was worried it may not work, but it did! I'm someone who's purchased $20-$50 straighteners my whole life so this was a splurge for me,and worth every penny! The titanium plates were different for me,because i've used ceramic all these years but in my opinion it absolutely lives up to the claim of creating smooth texture and eliminating frizz. My hair is SO soft and not frizzy at all! Totally worth it!

Okay, first let me start by mentioning that there are *two* drybar straighteners. The Tress Press digital iron ($150) & the Smooth Operator iron ($125). The Smooth Operator has had several reviews left under the Tress Press review thread & seem to be the handful of negative experiences. This straightener (Tress Press) has adjustable heat & if put on the hottest setting of 450 f, literally reaches the temperature within 5-10 seconds, instant! The plates are titanium & if you have previously used a tool with ceramic, these take some getting used to. The ceramic slides easier for sure, but the titanium w negative ions are much better on your hair (seals cuticle, tames frizz, less damage) & distributes heat more evenly so once you get the groove of the titanium the ease will no longer be a concern. It's like upgrading from a tricycle to a bike, sure one is easier, but the other more functional. Also, the iron automatically shuts off after an hour, & has a generous cord length & even has a memory so it will always turn onto the temperature setting you prefer. If you curl your hair w a straightener, this will keep your curls even longer & wraps easily with little tugging. I even tried straightening my hair after curling a few pieces to see how good it worked & if it could reverse the curl. It actually flattened out completely & looked like I started straightening from the get go! Overall I'm very impressed & so so happy I upgraded from my decade old Chi (which surprising is still going strong). Now I just hope this one has a lifespan the same.

This straightener is a massive disappointment. I have the Buttercup and adore it, and while on vacation had to purchase a straightener to touch up before a wedding, so I figured I'd splurge. I have thick, wavy hair that is generally too soft and heavy to hold curls, so straightening is my go-to. I had sprized a small about of Drybar's Triple Sec on the roots of my hair and went at the bottom with this, and just a slight mist of Triple Sec on the bottom hair totally gunked it up set to 400. After heating it up super hot and using a towel to get the gunk off, I turned it back down and tried doing my hair again - and this time, it barely straightened. It creased my hair when I tried to turn it under at the end and it didn't fight my wave at all.  My Chi may be 10+ years old, but it straightens so much more effectively than this iron. Don't waste your money on this.

I'm slowly switching all of my styling tools/products to Drybar! The combination of the dryer, Hot Toddy, and this iron has drastically improved the appearance of my hair. I have fine but thick, frizzy and dry hair and this iron is gentle but high powered enough to tame my frizz. I especially love how quickly it heats up, just a matter of seconds!

I have very thick hair and I was worried about ordering a hair straightener because there's mixed reviews about a lot of them not working for anyone who doesn't have fine hair. I figured I test it out and ordered this one. It was a little confusing to turn on at first with no distinct on and off button and it blinks at you for a minute as you adjust the heat. But if you leave it alone, it heats up pretty quickly. It does an amazing job on my hair. I ordered the clips as well, although my experience is that I usually need 10 clips to efficiently piece my hair up and make it hold. Those things could hold my entire head of hair in two! I'm impressed. I'm definitely keeping these products.

I just purchased this Flatiron based on the reviews... It's going back to the store immediately!!!! it leaves dents in your hair and it does not run through smoothly at all! My hair looks frizzy! I have fairly easy hair to work with it's a long straight and smooth... This Flatiron has made it frizzy .. I'm extremely disappointed

I have long, dry, wavy, coarse hair and this straightener gets the job done!! It works so fast and does such a good job I don't even have to turn it on the highest setting. It is hot enough  to straighten even my hair, yet puts out little heat on me which I love bc usually I sweat to death getting ready after blow drying and straightening my hair. It also makes my hair SO SOFT I just want to keep straightening it even when it's done! LOVE this straightener...so worth the money!!

My last flat iron was one I bought ten years ago at Sephora, so it was time for a new one.  I like the width and temperature control on this one, as well as the long cord.  I took one star off because my desired temperature won't set (even though I follow the directions), and oftenI hit the buttons while ironing, and have to turn it back on and re-set my desired temp.

I have long, thick hair that dries straight but often don't have time to blow dry it leaving the ends fizzy and dull. By running the iron through my hair I'm able to smooth and add shine in minutes.When I'm sick of my stick straight hair I also use the iron to add waves. This took practice but love that it straightens and curls.

After over a decade of using exclusively Chi flat irons, I knew I wanted to try out a new brand as I was growing tiresome of lackluster results. I read hundreds of reviews on top flat irons and came to the conclusion that reviews seem to be split on all irons. I took a chance on this iron as I had recently purchase the Buttercup blow dryer. I was blown away at the results. This iron heats up almost instantaneously when turning it on. The iron gives smooth, straight results in one pass and doesn't snag my hair-which was a problem I had with previous irons. For reference, I have very thick, wavy hair. I am so impressed I am now considering getting the Drybar curling iron.

I hesitated to buy this straightener at first, but I'm so glad I ended up purchasing it! My hair is so thick and wavy, but this straightener manages to make my stubborn hair super straight, shiny, and soft. It literally takes me 15 mins to straighten my hair (with one pass), whereas before my Phillips straightner took me 2 hours with several passes. ~

I recently purchased this product. I am AMAZED. This straightener GLIDES through my THICK hair. I used it both as a curling iron and a straightener. My hair is smooth and the I only have to run through ONE TIME.  The dry bar products are the absolute best. I have never been disappointed. Don't hesitate over the price it is worth the money!

I purchased this shortly after my beloved flatiron finally decided to give out on me after 8 years.  Oh I didn't know what I was missing out on! This flatiron heats up so quickly and truly does leave my hair (thin and curly) straight in one pass, also doesn't weigh down my hair like my previous one did. I guess after so long I didn't know the difference but now I do! The price is steep trust me I regretted purchasing as soon as I did, but! If this iron can last me 8 years it's an investment! Love it so much don't regret purchasing at all!

This iron heats up extremely fast. It truly straightens with one pass. I've used it on thick wavy hair and the result was soft, silky straight hair in half the time it took using my old chi flatiron. You will not be disappointed  with this purchase.

I am very surprised at all the great reviews about it.  I purchased it and returned it the next day. I didn't like it at all. I have used a variety of hair straighteners before so I have plenty to compare it to. I just did not find it to be a good straightener. It does the job but that's about it. Made my hair feel flat and stringy. For the price you can get MUUUUCH better.
I have hideous frizzy hair and it always takes at least 3 passes with a typical flat iron but bible right now i LOVE this iron!!!!

Heats up quick!  Super compact, great if your always on the go, to the gym etc. I love the fact that I can curl my hair with this hair with this straightener I've tried before with my own straighter and it would leave dents (EW!)   Overall I am pleased with this product, I have long, curly wavy hair, my hair is pretty thick as well and it did straighten my hair on the first stroke at 400.   I got the chance to buy this in a bundle with some dry bar hair products and so far their products are on point! DO NOT HESITATE on the purchase :)

I have 3A/3B curls and this straightener works great. I never go above 380-390 and yet I can get my already dried hair straight in about 15 minutes. Perfect! And my hair feels silky smooth after using this straightener.

reviews.review_title: works great but not worth the price
