reviews.review_text: I have used other much cheaper irons and had the same result. Not worth the exorbitant price.

I had my HAI hair straightener for 11 years before it took a dive. I received this for Christmas and it's so easy to use. Makes my hair look shiny and smooth. It's super simple to curl your hair with (I'm the worst at this yet using this hair straightener makes it much easier) I've been to the actual dry bar twice and this place is great their hair products are great!
It gets the job done quick, doesn't leave my hair frizzy, and leaves it shiny and soft Absolutely love it

I recently picked this flat iron up after returning one to Sephora and I absolutely LOVE it. It is my first Drybar purchase and I would highly recommend it; especially to gals who also have heavy/course/thick hair like I do. The flat iron has enough weight, it heats up super fast, and it has a memory button so it goes straight to whatever preset temp you decide. I am definitely more inclined to try other Drybar products again. Very satisfied!

This straightener is great. I use it for straightening and curling my shoulder length, very thick hair and it does a great job of both. The first time anyone sees me since I started using this they always ask me if I just got my hair cut. This always leaves me with a perfect salon look and it's normal to use as far as straighteners go. I only give it 4 stars because of its price. While it is worth it, it does leave it inaccessible to a lot of people.

My mom has the DryBar blow dryer which is amazing. I use their dry shampoo which is my favorite. But this straightener, is not. I want to like it, but I can't. Although it doesn't snag my hair, I almost have to pull it through my hair. It doesn't glide AT ALL :(

Heats up really fast and has an automatic shut off, basically all it takes to sell me on a straightening iron. But luckily there's some other excellent perks, such as being great at straightening my hair faster than previous ones I've used and being a great size for curling and making waves. I have super curly hair but this straightens quickly and leaves my hair looking healthy.

I ordered this in the value set they had recently with hot toddy and 100 proof. I love this straightener so much already! It heats up so quickly (less than a minute) and I can straighten all of my hair in 15 minutes. No frizz, no tugging, no pulling, and very easy to use. My previous straightener, a  Rusk, took about 30 minutes to do all of my hair, but also tugged and pulled so this one is fantastic in comparison!

I basically got this straightener based on the reviews I was about to buy the GHD limited edition but this was cheaper and had higher ratings. However, I so far used it once and I'm still eh about it. I have thick curly hair, it took me multiple time to get it straight. I did not glide it once more like 7 or 8. I had a chi prior I hated it bc it damaged my hair but the chi got my hair straight and it only takes me about 15 mins to do my entire head. This straightener however took me longer. I just wasn't impressed. I'm gonna give it a few more try's . If I don't like it after the next few days I'm gonna have to return it and get the GHD like I wanted. It's such a shame bc I was hoping to love it. I only rated this 4 stars only bc I used it once.

This is the best flat iron I've ever purchased! I usually have very wavy and hard to straighten hair. This straightener smoothed and straightened my hair in no time. It also leaves it shiny and healthy feeling rather than dry and brittle. Only thing I wish is that I knew how to curl with it!
Heats up quick. Lightweight. Gives hair the shine you want. Curls hair smoothly. So happy with my purchase!

I recently purchased the ghd eclipse which is nearly $100 more than this straightener. My ghd stopped working randomly and I'm so happy it did because it led me to this amazing straightener. It is literally fool proof and only takes 1 stroke to straighten my thick curly hair! As someone who ONLY wears their hair straight, I recommend this straightener to anyone who wants a sleek finish in a short amount of time.

I mainly bought this flat iron as a quick way to curl my hair. It does a really nice job at straightening my hair, but when I tried to curl my hair, no matter what I tried it would not move smoothly down my hair shaft leaving kinks instead of curls! I tried so many different angles and twists and I'm convinced it's the material of the plates that was making it run so choppy down my hair. Returned it, really wanted to love it :(

Best iron I have had to date. Its so smooth, so easy. I have curly hair and it works wonders on it. Even style really well for curling and throwing in little flips of volume. I am really picky with my irons and this one is a keeper!

Love this hair straighter! I needed a new one so badly, I have really curly hair and needed one that would cut the time of styling my hair in half and this one does it! I only set it to 350 and it was so hot and it can go up to 450! Definitely recommend for people who need a new hair straightener!! Especially for the price!!

It straightens my hair and has a 60 minute auto shut off. What more do I need? I haven't tried curling with it, but plan to soon.  My previous straightener was a $60 off brand that lasted 6 years until it died. If this one lasts half the amount of time, I'll be a happy camper.
This straightener is ok. It absolutely does straighten; however, I can't help but notice that my hair feels very dry since purchasing. Strengths of this product: It heats up quick.

I recently broke my straightener and I needed a new one asap. I've read many reviews of this straightener and watched many videos on youtube until I finally bought it. After using it for a couple of days now, I could honestly say that I love it! It only takes me 5 minutes max to straighten and my hair is really thick. After straightening my hair it became so soft and silky! I highly HIGHLY recommend if you are ever looking for a new straightener!!

In love with this straightener. Heats up super quickly, and has an automatic shut off, so no more worrying about accidentally leaving it on all day and buring the house down. Heat setting is adjustable which is a great feature and there is a memory setting to keep from having to bump it up or down every time. Pretty sure there is not a better tool out there.

This straightener is by far the best one I've ever owned. I've always owned a good straighter (usually a CHI) but my hair still took forever to straighten (I have really thick frizzy hair). When my CHI broke and they no longer made the CHI that I liked, I decided to give this a try. I'm so glad I did because I like it more than my CHI!

this flat iron is the best one I've owned. It leaves my hair so smooth and flat and with no frizz. It doesn't make my hair look dry and brittle and ive owned GHD and so many more brands but this is hands down the best.

It gets hot in 30 seconds! It straightens my hair super silky, without frizz and best of all it doesn't damage my hair like the cheap irons I have always used. Worth the investment. If you are considering buying it, don't hesitate. It will change your life specially cut styling time a lot!!!
Perfect for straightening or curling hair. Heats up quickly and the digital screen that shows its temperature is helpful.

Its not the best one ive ever used but very close to it . It used to take me close to an hour to get my hair straight and now its only 20 minute process. I have super thick , frizzy, course, dry hair and it absolutely transforms my hair. I love it. The price is great.

I bought this because of the good reviews and because I was finally ready to spend money on a good straightener.  I can't say that my hair looks much better than when I straighten it with my old $40 straightener. It's also been less than two weeks and it's already making a horrible squeaking sound every time I use it, as if I'd had it for years. I also noticed that I need to press the on button several times before it turns on. Sometimes it doesn't work at all and I need to unplug it and try again.  I'm very disappointed with the purchase and I will be returning it and trying a different brand.

I am not someone who takes a long time to get ready so I LOVE this hair straightener. It warms up fast and straightens or curls really quickly. I have pretty fine hair but when I curl it with this product you would not know it.

I'm not a fan of the yellow but it works amazing so I can deal with the colour hah I had a previous straightener for 8 years but it started to loose heat and it would take forever to straighten my hair. This straightener is amazing, the instructions on the inside for which heat setting to use for which hair thickness helped a lot as my old one didn't have a temperature option. My hair looks even longer now because this straightens it so well. People have been complementing me on my hair much more than they ever have. Best investment I've made.

I have long curly hair and straightening my hair has always been a hassle. However this iron has made it so much easier to straighten my hair. It's cut my styling time in half and it really does heat up in 60 seconds or less. I have had this for about 3 months now and I would recommend it to anyone with curly or straight hair. My hair looks sleek and healthy after using this.
My hair is very dry and damaged, and this flat iron makes my gross hair feel normal again. Worth every last penny. Highly recommend over the T3!
This is the best hair straightener I've ever had and I've had very many. It leaves hair looking sleek and shiny and most of all, straight. Best if used with an oiling to tame fly always and frizz

Love this thing! I have fine hair (but lots of it) that easily holds curl and straightens. The Chi’s I have had in the past haven’t had the option to adjust the heat, which I didn’t really care for because why subject your hair to the high heat when it isn’t needed? Plus, I could have all kinds of volume going on and the Chi would just wipe it out. I can use this on 300 degrees (just got it today, and plan to try it on even lower settings) and it smooths my hair VERY nicely with leaving the volume. Even my husband mentioned how much he likes my hair tonight (and he NEVER notices much change in my hair.  I was extra surprised because I really don't care for drybars styling products, as I feel they make my hair feel gunky and don't really do that much for it  Bonus points that it comes in my favorite color.
Heats up so fast. Great for straightening and curling. Doesn't leave crimp marks or pull as it has rounded edges.

I was a bit worried about spending so much but I Love This Thing! I am frequently up way before my husband and now I can do my hair super nice without my hair dryer waking him up. I have loved almost all of my dry bar stuff and this is my favorite by far! Next splurge will be the dryer.
This is the best flat iron I've ever own! It gets hot in 30 sec and makes my hair look perfect in 5 min! I would highly recommande this iron.

I recived this for Christmas as I was in desperate need of a new flat iron. I have used this iron twice and it leaves my hair 100% PIN STRAIGHT! It keeps my hair straight like I have just done it for as long as I want and I am extremely impressed with how quickly it heats up. I have very very thick, long, coarse, wavy hair so it is very time consuming to straighten my hair except for with this iron. Love it and would definitely recommend!

I asked for this for Christmas and ended up getting it! I used it for the first time yesterday and was amazed. I have thick, frizzy, curly hair which does not straighten easily. I used the highest heat setting and only had to go over each piece 2 times! I probably could have gotten away with just one time but I am picky with getting it as straight as possible. It made my hair so smooth and silky. A flat iron has never done that to my hair before! I woke up today and my hair is still perfectly straight. I don't need to do any touch ups at all! This is the first review I've ever written, that's how much I love this product!

Bought this straighner, fell in love with it immediately! It really gives you that salon look AND feel. I'm honestly sooo impressed! I've been using a CHI straightner for about 5 years now and was never fully satisfied with it but whatever it did the job right? Man, such a difference! Love love love drybar's tress press!

I had an amazing GHD straightener that I managed to fry overseas. Don't ask. I bought this because it was more affordable and I actually find that it works almost as well as the GHD. Would definitely recommend.
Love this flat iron. I had an more expensive Chi brand before and thought it couldn't get any better. This heats up quickly and does the perfect flattening with one pass.
Thought it looked amazing. Light and easy to handle. But straightening was no better than cheaper flat irons I've used.

This styling iron is pretty good. 10/10 for straightening, which I would hope so, for the price point. I'm still trying to get used to curling with it, as this one tool is replacing my Jilbere straightener and my Hot tools curling iron, both of which I have had since being a freshman in HS. The only reasons I am giving 4 stars is because I think that it's not really worth the 150, it didn't blow me away. Also, it's tough to get used to for curling, and the curls didn't turn out that well. But that may come with time and more getting used to styling with it. I just have to get to know it better. Bottom line, if you are looking for an all-in-one tool, this isn't a bad choice. I imagine it will last for a long time (fingers crossed) and become second nature for me to use.

I was hesitant to buy this at first because I like everything to be absolutely perfect, and this flat iron is absolutely perfect. It straightens hair like a salon, the color is beautiful, great technology, love love LOVE! my new obsession. BUY IT

Let me first say I love everything Drybar... with one exception. Tress Press arrived last wee, was really excited to try. Used it ONE time -- can't use it again because it won't turn on. The one time it worked, it was just okay. I have way more luck using their round brush/dryer duo. That being said, I will return it today and try it again, I think. Stay tuned.

This is the first flat iron I've used since six years with the same CHI flat iron, I decided to give this one a try. It does leave my hair nice and straight, but the process is rough. My other straightener would smoothly glide down the shaft of the hair. This one yanks and it feels like there is something yucky on the plates pulling on individual hairs. I will give it a dew more tries before deciding whether to return it.
after using my Sedu for 7+ years, it was time for an upgrade. This leaves my hair glossy and perfectly straightened. I've gotten compliments on how my hair looks salon straightened.
Love Drybar! This iron makes my thick wavy hair very shiny! Great quality. Very happy I purchased it! The

I guess you could say I am a flat iron junkie...lol. In my closet right now I have about 15 flat irons that I was never happy with...I decided to give this one a try and after the first use I do believe I saw glitter and rainbows...my hair has never looked better and people approach me all the time now and tell me that they like my hair...and I do believe it is because of this flat iron...because it has never happen before. Trust me, give it a try and maybe you will also see glitter and rainbows...:)
I own an Amica, T3 one pass and a CHI this is the best flat iron I've ever owned hands down. I look like I went to a salon. I'm in love! Job well done Drybar.

I've been needing a new straightener for months and I've been deciding between this one and GHD models that are around $300. My old straightener was fantastic and I was worried that this one wouldn't live up to my high expectations. Since receiving this one I've loved it. It takes less time than my previous straightener however I notice my hair doesn't stay straight for as long. Usually I need to touch it up after work or the next day. That being said it's still great. I love that I can customize the temperature and save it so it always heats to that level. It leaves my hair feeling soft each time I use it. And the colour is amazing. Even though my hair doesn't stay straight as long as it used to it's still a great straightener and beats the $300 GHD models in my opinion.

I have purchased relatively decent flat irons previously but this has instantly become my favorite styling tool! I have naturally wavy and very thick coarse hair. I was able to get the desired effect in half the time with no frizz! I'm going to save a ton on oil now that I have this flat iron! Money well spent!

This was my first splurge for a straightener I will say it is worth every penny I am in love with it and the way it leaves my hair smooth and non-frizzy. I really have stubborn curly hair which used to take ever to straighten; but this one straightener is amazing takes very little time for me to straighten my hair. I love love love it.... Highly recommend to buy it.... I must say the colour of the straightener is gorgeous as well I always wanted a yellow colour one and this made my dream come true.... Thank you dry bar...

I've spent the last couple months completely hating my hair after what I thought was a terrible haircut. However, my good flat iron died around that same time and I bought a cheap 70$ Hot Tools one. Turns out that one was just brutal leaving it thick and weird looking when straightened. I took a chance and bought this one. . Absolutely amazing. Heats up in seconds and does a perfect job with minimal need to do it in sections. I am so in love! The right tool makes all the difference.
This definitely straightened my hair, but made it have static and frizz. Bummer.

I promised the SA at my Sephora that'd I'd leave a review once I tried this out since there were so few of them online. I took a chance on this straightener but I think for the price point it's totally worth it.  Compared to T3/GHD this is the only basic model that allows you to actually choose your temperature which is awesome. I love that the controls aren't on the handle but in the middle of the straightener so you don't accidentally turn it off while using it.  So far I've only used it to curl/wave my hair - took a bit of getting used to because it's much different in size compared to my old straightener, but it works great! Glides quickly through my hair and leaves it frizz-free, a definite plus because my hair is so thick/coarse generally.  Love this device, for the price you can't go wrong!
I love that I can choose how hot this gets, and the short amount of time it takes to get there. It does a great job at straightening and curling my hair.
Have natural hair that is really puffy when blow dried, this iron made my roots (and everything else) superrrr straight, smooth & shiny which is hard to find. Def recommend this. Thank you drybar

I think this is new... had to have it as soon as I saw how pretty it was. I was immediately impressed. Smooth, lots of control. Straightened like a demon and I have thick hair! I think this is the best iron I've ever used. Drybar stuff is soooo good. Looove it.
Loved it. Made my hair sleek and smooth with minimal effort. so esy to use.
